casebody.data:
2016-0978 (La. 9/16/16)

STATE of Louisiana v. Vernon CLAY NO. 2016-KK-0978 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 16, 2016

Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. D, No. 522-823; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2016-K-0140

Denied.

HUGHES, J., would grant.
